CustomField.description: Calculates the Employee's Local Time using the GMT offset value(This field was created for NPL MA).
CustomField.formula: DATETIMEVALUE( DATEVALUE ( CASE( MOD(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) - DATE(1900, 1, 7), 7), 0, CreatedDate +9, 1, CreatedDate +8, 2, CreatedDate +7, 3, CreatedDate +6, 4, CreatedDate +5, 5, CreatedDate +4, 6, CreatedDate +3, CreatedDate ) ))+ ( (9+ IF(!ISBLANK(PersonnelNumber__r.Service_Resource__r.Diab_Offset__c), PersonnelNumber__r.Service_Resource__r.Diab_Offset__c, 0) )/24)
CustomField.label: Local Date/Time
